version_description:
Updated for iOS 8
Resume edits between devices using Handoff
Inspiration widget in Today view
Open in Photos app using Extensions

Updated for iOS 8
Resume edits between devices using Handoff
Inspiration widget in Today view
Open in Photos app using Extensions

Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
Improved Union export quality

Optimized for iPhone 6 and 6 Plus
Improved Union export quality

Added 3 New Shape Packs
Fixed Photos album initially appearing empty on iOS 8.0.2

Added 3 New Shape Packs
Fixed Photos album initially appearing empty on iOS 8.0.2

Bug fixes
Performance improvements
Optimized for iPhone 6 Plus

Bug fixes
Performance improvements
Optimized for iPhone 6 Plus

Three new effects! Outline, Glow and old school 3d Glasses. Try them out by swiping up on the shape selector section of the UI.

Also Import your own custom fragment shapes from SVG files. Tap import at the bottom of the pack selector screen.

Thanks! If you love Fragment please write a review!

Three new effects! Outline, Glow and old school 3d Glasses. Try them out by swiping up on the shape selector section of the UI.

Also Import your own custom fragment shapes from SVG files. Tap import at the bottom of the pack selector screen.

Thanks! If you love Fragment please write a review!

We hope you enjoy all the new content and video input in this latest update. Please take a minute and help us out with rating and review or update your current review for Fragment 1.7.

- 6 new shape packs!
- Video import (iOS 8 only)
- Free-to-use photos, illustrations, and overlays in Pixite Source from the image picker

We hope you enjoy all the new content and video input in this latest update. Please take a minute and help us out with rating and review or update your current review for Fragment 1.7.

- 6 new shape packs!
- Video import (iOS 8 only)
- Free-to-use photos, illustrations, and overlays in Pixite Source from the image picker

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

This version ads support for the iPad Pro screen size along with lots of other little fixes and improvements.

As always, if you like the app please write us a review. Great reviews really help us keep adding features in the future.
